amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, an additional $4,500,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Army, for procurement of the RI-2200 and RI-2400 Long Arm High-Intensity Arc Metal Halide Handheld Searchlight.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2487 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2487 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12592) To provide, with an offset, an additional $4,500,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Army, for procurement of the RI-2200 and RI-2400 Long Arm High-Intensity Arc Metal Halide Handheld Searchlight.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2487 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2487 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
